node.title: Christ in Me Through Beholding
node.description: Have you ever wondered why reading the bible is boring and your spiritual life does not seem to advance? Do you get discouraged because those same character defects seem to constantly arise despite even praying for victory? By beholding we become changed. What I take in through my senses can either hinder OR support Christ's work in me. Let's learn what are some healthy forms of entertainment and those that could be hindering us.
